name: Delude - Succubus Prison
description: The game has a seal for people over 18 years old. DELUDE is Studio Halissoni newest work. DELUDE is a game with an engaging and mysterious story. In this game you are in the shoes of Luiz D and need to find the exit of the succubus prison.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+ Storage: 276 MB available space
